about_the_game:
Tropical Monster Girls is an Adult Survival game with a focus on cute 3D graphics, captivating gameplay, and sexy monster girls. You find yourself rescued by a beautiful mermaid. Now you must craft, build, and struggle to survive. Build relationships with the girls on the island in this exciting new open-world survival game.

FALL IN LOVE

Your ship has been raided and sunk, leaving yourself as the only known survivor. Now, you must work your way up. Build a relationship with the monster girls on the island. Protect them from danger, help them out, and they'll show you their appreciation by fulfilling your desires in ways only a monster girl can.

BUILD YOUR FUTURE

A mysterious force lurks forward in the shadows, spreading chaos with every step. Struggle to survive as you gather materials, craft weapons, tools, and defenses. Build and decorate your home, then, build a village! Grow crops and vegetables, prepare food, and go from not just surviving but thriving.

FEATURES

  • Hot monster girls, each with a unique personality & preferred methods of fun ;)

  • A vast mysterious and fantastical island to explore

  • An alive ecosystem where plants grow over time

  • Day/Night cycle which makes the dark as dangerous as it looks

  • Grow your relationship as you protect & prosper for the monster girls you rescue

  • Build a base and create custom bedrooms for your girls.

  • Fight off monster raids to protect your house.
